longBusinessSummary: Max India Limited provides services related to senior living communities in India. It operates through Business Investments, Senior Living, Assisted Care, and Other segments. The company engages in treasury investments, rental from investment property services, and offers functional support services. It also caters to the seniors by providing Care at Home services and Care Homes facilities. In addition, the company offers daily living and memory care, and specialized care services; management and consultancy, and shared services, as well as rents and sells MedCare products. Additionally, it engages in the learning and development activities; construction and leasing of senior living communities; and management of investments activities. The company was formerly known as Advaita Allied Health Services Limited. Max India Limited was incorporated in 2019 and is based in Gurugram, India.
